Package dontlookback

Class Player

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Biped, Human
public class Player extends Object implements Human
Player Character Controller Manages the player character's attributes, movement, and interactions within the game world. This class implements the Human interface and provides core player functionality for the horror survival game. Key Features: - Character movement and speed control - Physical attributes (weight, gender) - Item interaction system - Player state management The Player class serves as the central point for all player-related game mechanics and provides the interface between user input and game world interactions.
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team
See Also:

Don't Look Back - Horror Survival Game Engine

Built with Java 17, LWJGL 3.3.4, JBox2D | GitHub Repository | Report Issues
